doc:
Charles Gemora https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_Gemora 0 Carlos Cruz Gemora (June 15, 1903 – August 19, 1961), commonly known as Charles Gemora, was a former Hollywood makeup artist renowned as "the King of the Gorilla Men" for his prolific appearances in many Hollywood films while wearing a gorilla suit. Carlos_Cruz_Gemora ( June_15_,_1903 – August_19_,_1961 ) , commonly_known as Charles_Gemora , was a_former_Hollywood_makeup_artist renowned as " the_King of the_Gorilla_Men " for his_prolific_appearances in many_Hollywood_films while wearing a_gorilla_suit .
